Interpretation: Except where the prevalence values are taken from household surveys, changes between years need to be interpreted with caution as they might reflect a change in the methodology or the data source from which the estimate was derived and therefore should not be considered as a change in prevalence. Opioids include prescription opioids, opiates (opiates include opium and heroin). Includes estimates for the countries for which a total Opioid prevalence was reported or available.
